Title: Chapter Three: Let 'Em In
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Dre Ryan
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: Tomas and Marcus seek permission from papal emissaries to conduct an exorcism, only to be met with shocking news, while Casey exhibits odd behavior.
